kicker: Founder briefing • Self-guided • Earn the badge
subhead: A clean onboarding gate: mission notes, expectations, and a lightweight quiz that stores a badge locally (not access control).
description: A founder welcome/onboarding seed with optional quiz gate.

bodies: We prefer real artifacts over long promises. Minimal steps, maximum momentum.
Write notes like someone else will maintain it next month. Screenshots and reproducible steps win.
Clarity beats cleverness: consistent naming, consistent structure, consistent results.

descs: Scan the insights and make sure the vibe fits.
Earn a badge (stored locally) to signal commitment.

prompts.hero_prompt: Cinematic lakeside night scene with glowing circuitry vines and a clean badge emblem hovering above calm water, soft fog, neon-gold highlights, wide hero composition, no text

prompts.card_tex_prompt: Aged paper texture with faint stamped seals and subtle edge wear, clean center space
prompts.footer_bg_prompt: Minimal night horizon with gentle glow, tiny particles drifting, wide background

quiz.title: Quick gate (prototype)
quiz.desc: This is not real access control — it just captures effort. Enter 5 comma-separated specifics you learned (tools, rules, steps, or naming).
quiz.placeholder: Example: tokens-first CSS, no frameworks, GitHub Pages deploy, reveal cards, progress path
quiz.status_default: Tip: be specific. Commas separate your answers.
